name: Prince Derendil

trait.name: Wounded Fury
text: While it has 10 hit points or fewer, Prince Derendil has advantage on attack rolls. In addition, it deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage to any target it hits with a melee attack.

action.name: Multiattack
text: Prince Derendil makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

description: Source: Out of the Abyss p. 6
